channel.title: I would like some help on chaning the ip of a 562 client tyvm :)
channel.description: jsut got a new source its a 562 one i dled the corruption x client i needed a client and i cant figure out how the heck to change the ip? i serched client i found the client.class there isnt a dang client.java for some reason? so if you know of a tutoiral plz tell me :) would realy appreceate it

item.title: I would like some help on chaning the ip of a 562 client tyvm :)
item.dc:creator: @tidus44 tidus44
item.description:
@tidus44 wrote:

Open the Source folder, If you dont have it Press ALT so you get a toolbar at thhe top, Tools > Folder Options > View > Show Hidden files, Folders and drives.

Okay, so you have opened the source file search for client.java
Edit it, Once your on that screen the default ip is 127.0.0.1 So try that first. No luck? Try 0.0.0.0
If not still you will have to find out wat the IP is.

Then change to yours, Save. Then compile, Have fun!
-Calumn

Read full topic
